vwr.project.services.storage
Class ResourceManager

java.lang.Object
  vwr.project.services.storage.ResourceManager

public class ResourceManager
extends java.lang.Object

Resource Manager - simplifies access to resource objects, such as Texture objects, Audio objects, and TrueTypeFont objects. It automatically loads the resources from the game directory into hash maps, and names them by their file name.

Constructor Detail

ResourceManager

public ResourceManager(java.lang.String texDir,
                       java.lang.String sndDir,
                       java.lang.String fontDir)
                throws java.io.IOException,
                       java.awt.FontFormatException
Parameters:
texDir - - Directory to load textures from. PNG files only.
sndDir - - Directory to load sounds from. WAV files only.
fontDir - - Directory to load fonts from. TTF files only.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if files are not found, or some general IO error
java.awt.FontFormatException - specifically something went wrong when loading fonts
